author: hwright
msg: Release-docs: Update the section on publishing and publicizing a release.
(releasing-release): Update to reflect our use of ASF infrastructure.

author: slaws
msg: Fix for hanging compliance test JCA_11017. In some cases Axis doesn't have the "In" context available at the point at which the outgoing message is sent. There is already code in TransportReferenceInterceptor to capture the "In" context when a response is received. The test was hanging as this was causing a crash so the client waited for ever for a response which never came.

author: hwright
msg: Followup to r1140667: the API sneakily takes a svn_boolean_t * as a in/out
Pass the FALSE value via pointer instead of value.
